# Boxplots
```{r, echo=FALSE}
# Data input
table <- read.table(file = "table_16s_crasslike.txt",
                    sep = "\t",
                    header = TRUE,
                    check.names = FALSE)

knitr::kable(table)

table <- melt(table,
              id.vars=c("sample", "group"))

# boxplot
theme_set(theme_bw())
boxplot <- ggplot(data = table,
                  aes(y = value,
                      x = variable,
                      color = group)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = group)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = group),
             size = 1,
             shape = 21,
             position = position_jitterdodge()) +
  labs(x="", 
       y="Relative abundance", 
       title="Host crassphage") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90,
                                   hjust = 1,
                                   vjust = 0.5,
                                   size = 6),
        plot.title = element_text(face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5))

boxplot

# log10 transformation
table$value=log(table$value)

# boxplot
boxplot_log10 <- ggplot(data = table,
                  aes(y = value,
                      x = variable,
                      color = group)) +
  geom_boxplot(aes(color = group)) +
  geom_point(aes(color = group),
             size = 1,
             shape = 21,
             position = position_jitterdodge()) +
  labs(x="", 
       y="Relative abundance (log10)", 
       title="Host crassphage (log10)") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90,
                                   hjust = 1,
                                   vjust = 0.5,
                                   size = 6),
        plot.title = element_text(face = "bold",
                                  hjust = 0.5))

boxplot_log10

```
